name: Speed Punch
description: Deal 5 damage, and keep attacking with lower odds (75% -> 37.5% -> 18.75% and so on until failure).

immediateEffect.script: int totalDamage = 0; int hits = 0; double chance = 100; while (Rng.Next(100) < chance) { DealDamage(Opponent, 5); totalDamage += 5; hits++; chance *= 0.75; if (chance < 1) break; }
